message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I think the product's value is higher than $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit shy of $110. I was thinking more along the lines of $95.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer it to you for $105. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll offer it to you for $102. This is my final compromise. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $102 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $92. This is my final offer, I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me here.

I understand this is your final offer, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $100. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at $100, I'll have to consider other options. What do you think?

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower than $100, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $80 if we can't meet in the middle. I'm offering $92, this is my final offer.
